game_description: "If you are looking for a fast-paced racing game and love sci-fi vibes, this is the game for you." - The Verge Multiple ways to play: - Career mode - Online multiplayer - Time-trials - Leaderboards - Bonus game modes Hone your skills in single player mode. Race against AI, complete challenges to unlock new events, or shave seconds off your time in fast-lap mode. Take on racers from around the world in up to 4 PLAYER ONLINE MULTIPLAYER! Features: - Over 100 single player levels - 12 tracks to master (individually comfort rated) - Multiple bikes with unique handling characteristics - 8 diverse power-ups to give you an edge - Weapons to use against and help you beat friends, strangers or AI - Realistic bike leaning - corner hard & see the ground come up to meet you (can be disabled for comfort if desired) - Unique energy management mechanic - collect energy from rings to allow tactical off-track shortcuts through the void
